metadata.title: Kristian's Portfolio
metadata.description: Personal portfolio of Kristian, a web developer with experience in Next.js, React, and TypeScript.

hero.title: Kristian Restrepo Osorio
hero.subtitle: Systems Engineer | Web Developer | RPA | Python | JavaScript | PHP | TypeScript | Django | Next.js | Laravel

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: I am a Systems Engineering student at EAFIT University, passionate about programming, automation, and web development. I focus on creating efficient and scalable solutions using languages like Python, JavaScript, and PHP, along with frameworks like Django, Laravel, and Next.js. I have developed skills in leadership, teamwork, and communication through my experience as an academic monitor and leader of student groups. I have experience in managing collaborative work using platforms like GitHub and Azure, as well as agile methodologies like Scrum. I am committed to continuous learning and exploring new technologies in software development.
